# File 'app/models/profile_field_mixins/has_child_profile_fields.rb', line 106

def build_child( key )
  children.build( label: key )
end

- (Object) build_child_fields(keys)

80

# File 'app/models/profile_field_mixins/has_child_profile_fields.rb', line 78

def build_child_fields( keys )
  if self.parent == nil # do it only for the parent, not the children as well
    keys.each do |key|
      build_child(key) unless find_child_by_key(key)
    end
  end
end

- (Object) build_child_fields_if_absent 



72
73
74
75
76
 
# File 'app/models/profile_field_mixins/has_child_profile_fields.rb', line 72

def build_child_fields_if_absent
  if self.children.count == 0
    build_child_fields self.keys
  end
end

- (Object) find_child_by_key(key) 



61

# File 'app/models/profile_field_mixins/has_child_profile_fields.rb', line 61

def find_child_by_key(key)
  # we have to use 'select' here instead of 'where', because this needs
  # to work before the records are saved. But this should not be a problem,
  # since there are only a couple of child fields.
  #
  self.children.select { |child| child.key.to_s == key.to_s }.first
end

- (Object) find_or_build_child_by_key(key) 



68
69
70
 
# File 'app/models/profile_field_mixins/has_child_profile_fields.rb', line 68

def find_or_build_child_by_key(key)
  find_child_by_key(key) || build_child(key)
end

- (Object) get_field(accessor) 



97
98
99
 
# File 'app/models/profile_field_mixins/has_child_profile_fields.rb', line 97

def get_field( accessor )
  find_child_by_key(accessor).value if find_child_by_key(accessor)
end

- (Object) set_field(accessor, value) 



101
102
103
104
 
# File 'app/models/profile_field_mixins/has_child_profile_fields.rb', line 101

def set_field( accessor, value )
  build_child_fields_if_absent
  find_child_by_key(accessor).value = value
end
